channel.title: Combat Level Help
channel.description: I am trying to make a minigame, but i want it so you can only be level 40+ to do it, how would i make it so you have to be level 40+ to do it?

item.title: Combat Level Help
item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

or you could just ask around a lil bit, and well find out how to make everyone who starts your server auto lvl 40

Read full topic

item.title: Combat Level Help
item.dc:creator: @adam9999 adam9999
item.description:
@adam9999 wrote:

it works, i have tested it playerLevel is defined on my server, so stfu

playerLevel[i] = your combat level!!!

item.title: Combat Level Help
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

[quote=“Stanyer, post:5, topic:195152”]Lmao

No, of course that wouldn’t work.

playerLevel[i]?

so how do you make so say 40-80 cmb can only join the portal?

Firstly, you haven’t defined i, secondly, the combat level isn’t based on part of the playerLevel integer, the variable for combat level is just “combat”.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

playerLevel[i]?

Firstly, you haven’t defined i, secondly, the combat level isn’t based on part of the playerLevel integer, the variable for combat level is just “combat”.

item.title: Combat Level Help
item.dc:creator: @adam9999 adam9999
item.description:
@adam9999 wrote:

yeh, i know that but what is the int for the combat?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2008, 11:46:19 AM[/size][hr]never mind i’ve done it

i think this is it?

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Halloween")) { if(playerLevel[i] > 126) { sendMessage("You are too high level to do this event") } if(playerLevel[i] > 40) { Halloween2008(); } else { sendMessage("You need to be level 40 to do the Halloween event"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Combat Level Help
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

You would make a teleport for it and then beside

if (.command.starts.with)“wateva” you would type

“&& combat>40”

This is inaccurate but i think yuo get the picture now
